title: Fox Campaigns
author: Fox Campaigns
created_time: September 10, 2023, 11:09:48 AMLast edit: October 02, 2023, 07:37:37 PM by Fox Campaigns
content: ⚠️ Campaign Rules ⚠️1. Bounty Campaign Starts on: 10 September - 14 October (5 weeks)2. $8000 SSC Coins will be distributed within 1 week after the bounty is over.3. Complete tasks and make reports every week. 4. Connect with Shinescan in social media;- Twitter: https://twitter.com/shinescanx- Telegram: https://t.me/shinescanchat- Learn more about  Shinescan:  https://sscchain.org/5. Tokens will be distributed depending on the quality of your work.6. Spammers, cheaters, bots, and similar participants will be banned immediately!7. Follow all the bounty groups/channels to get support and to stay updated;- Bounty Group:  https://t.me/shinescanbounty- Foxcampaigns Group: https://t.me/foxcampaigns- Foxcampaigns Channel: https://t.me/foxannouncementsCode:Proof of authentication;Telegram username:Campaigns applied:Metamask wallet address:Week 01: September 10 - 16Week 02: October 03 - 09Week 03: October 10 - 16Week 04: October 17 - 23Week 05: October 24 - 30Download Telegram AvatarYour Telegram Name | Shinescan AmbassadorGet 50 extra stakes to wear Telegram Avatar as an ambassadorHashtags;Use the following hashtags except on Telegram;#shinescan #blockchain #NFT #Bitcoin #Airdrop #DeFi #crypto #foxcampaigns #ethereum #BTCReport Theme;Code:Twitter campaign;Week 02: Oct 03 -  09Twitter profile link: xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxTweet;1.2.3.4.5.Retweet;1.2.3.4.5.
